choices: Sarah - The Childhood Friend
Kate - The Motherly Waitress
1.content:
Sarah - The Childhood Friend
A brunette with blue eyes, Sarah is the definition of a regular girl. You have known her since childhood and she is almost like a sister to you, sibling rivalry included. While the two of you often annoy each other to no end, you friendship has lasted into adulthood.

Kate - The Motherly Waitress
Mother of a pair of twins, Kate is the black haired waitress of Big Bites Diner. A familiar face to both you and Sarah. You’ve know her since you were kids, and she is like a second mother to the two of you. Your parents knew they could always leave you at her house if they needed a babysitter, and you often found yourself talking to her about things you couldn’t talk to anyone else about. She just had that gentle listening aura. By now she has to be in her mid-forties, though she still looks amazing, sometimes drawing eyes of younger men.

(I'll add more characters over time.)
1.title: Pick a Friend

choices: Sarah looks down and recognizes you.
You scream for her attention.
You try to climb her boot. (Micro Sized Option)
You run and hide.
She notices you, but thinks you're a bug.
11.content:
Sarah is a childhood friend of yours. Your mother was best friends with her mother, which lead to you visiting each other regularly and being forced to spend a lot of time together. This somehow blossomed into a strong friendship that still stands today. By now you have grown into very different people. If you didn’t have this history together, you probably wouldn’t even consider talking to each other.

The twenty year old dark brunette looks behind her, her blue eyes staring into yours.

“Are you coming?” Sarah says.

“Oh? Sure...” You say.

You shake your head out of memory lane, and catch up with Sarah, who is waiting at the park entrance. She had called you, asking to meet up. Seeing as the weather was good, you agreed to go for a walk. There is no doubt in your mind, as to why she wanted to see you. Sarah studies law at Hycenster University. Her final exam week has just ended, and you are sure that little bookworm is here to gloat about her success.

You both enter the park, walking on a sandy colored gravel road, which leads through the wide open grass with solitary trees spread about, a favorite spot for picnickers. Part of you regrets not bringing a basket.

“You seemed a bit lost in your head there.” Sarah says.

“Oh, yeah sorry about that.” You say.

“No, don’t worry. I’m just… wondering what you’re thinking about, you know. Give me a little peek into that busy head of yours.”

“Ah, it’s nothing, was just thinking about you.”

Sarah’s pretty blue eyes widen and her face turns red.

“Listen.” She says. “I really like you as a friend, you’re like a brother to me.”

In turn, your eyes widen and you can feel your face go red.

“Woah, no, no, no! That’s not what I meant!” You stutter. “I was thinking back on how we became friends.”

Sarah’s face cools off and she smiles. “How can I forget, you breaking all my dolls.”

You smile back awkwardly. “Well, we were playing Godzilla.”

Both of you laugh.

“Do you think we’d become friends if we met now?” You ask.

Sarah frowns. “What do you mean?”

“I mean, we’re… two very different people. You’re like a very regular girl, going to parties and dressing pretty basic.”

She interrupts. “Sorry, basic?”

“Yeah, you’re wearing blue jeans, a white shirt and a brown jacket and boots. That’s a copy paste wardrobe.”

“I’m sorry, but I’m not gonna take style advice from someone like you.” She says with a raised eyebrow and sarcastic voice. “I agree we’re very different. I grew up, and you’re still that immature little kid. I’m sure we wouldn’t get along if we met now, ‘cause you’re a loser with shit social skills.”

Beneath the sarcastic tone you felt there was some honesty. Afraid you’ve actually pissed her off you try and change the subject.

“Uhh, well, let’s stop talking about who’s the loser, and start talking about who’s the winner. How did your exam go?”

Sarah knows exactly what you’re trying to do, but fails to keep up the judgmental look. She smiles at your charmingly blunt switch from insulting her, to brownnosing. The girl folds her fingers into each other and stretches her arms over her head.

“First of my class on every single test.” She says, with a smug grin on her face.

“Liar, there has someone who beat you in at least one test.”

Sarah’s face contorts in to what is pretty much a pout. “Well there was one guy, who also got all answers correct on a test.”

You smirk. “Meaning at least one person is tied with you.”

Sarah groans. “On one test...”

You smile at her, realizing this was pretty much how every conversation went between the two of you. Bickering like brother and sister. Sarah smiles back, before hearing a text notification. She reaches in to her purse (which is the same ‘basic’ brown as her jacket and boots) and pulls out her phone. While she checks her messages, you wait with her. Both of you standing still in the middle of the path. As you look around, you notice there really aren’t many people out in the park today. A sudden chill runs down your spine and you turn to look at Sarah, whose eyes are still locked to her screen. You feel like something bad is about to happen, but you don’t know what, until…

...your vision turns black.

You wake up, only a second later, lying on the uncomfortable ground. You look up at Sarah, who’s standing over you, still looking at her phone. How did she not notice you fall down in front of her? Is she texting for an ambulance? Looking up at her, you feel weird, as if there is a lot of distance to her face.

“Sarah?” You mumble, but she doesn’t respond.

You turn around and push yourself up off the rocks, which have the same sandy color as the gravel path. Getting up, you take a quick look to your left and right, seeing how far the path stretches. Your heart sinks and you look behind you. You can hardly believe it. Your childhood friend towers over you like a colossus, even the tip of her boot dwarfs you. You scream in terror at the sight of what is pretty much a normal young woman, falling onto your back in shock.

You mutter to yourself as the realization sets in. “N-No way. I… I shrunk…”

Sarah doesn’t seem to have noticed you’re gone yet, still scrolling her thumb across her screen. She shifts one of her boots back, making terrifying crunching sounds against the gravel. You realize how dangerous your size is, and know you’re going to need her help if you want to survive this. On the other hand, Sarah is also the biggest threat to your life.
11.title: Boring and Basic Sarah

choices: She promises to help and care for you.
She carelessly dumps you into her purse and takes you home.
She puts you in her mouth.
She teases you and pretends to try and stomp you.
She decides it would be fun to just kill you.
111.content:
Sarah lowers her phone to check on you, surprised you didn’t wait for her.

“Hey, where’d you go?” She says.

What she doesn’t know, is that you are right in front of her feet, terrified. She has always been, hotter, more successful and better than you in every other way, but this takes things to a whole other level. Your friend is a literal giant to you now. You can hardly fumble out a word to get her attention. Sarah sighs and lowers her eyes, while reaching into her purse to take out her phone again. You see the pair of big blue eyes align in your direction, and are filled with hope. While you are expecting immediate care and help, nothing happens. Your friend just stands there, frozen. Her lips slowly parting as her chin shakes.

“You’re… Are you...” Sarah mutters.

“Yes, it’s me! Sarah, it’s me!” You say.

Your giant friend takes her hand out of her purse. She crouches in front of you, leaning forward to get a better look. Her big blue eyes observing you like the impossibility you are.

“What happened?” She says.

You shrug. “I don’t know, everything went black, and now this.”

With her mouth wide open, Sarah slowly reaches her hand down, her fingers stretching out towards you. Their enormous size makes you both fear them, and admire the detail you can see on both her soft skin and smooth fingernails. You take a few steps back, but it takes only a small movement for her to brush the tip of her middle finger against your body, almost knocking you over.

“Oh my god, he’s real.” Sarah mumbles under her breath. “This is insane.”

“Yeah, I know…” You say.

“You gotta admit though, this is kinda cool.”

“What?”

“You being all little, it should be impossible. But isn’t it awesome? There are so many things I could do with you.”

You start to worry. “Sarah be serious about this, I’m scared out of my mind.”

The face of the blue eyed brunette forms a familiar smile.
111.title: Noticed by Sarah

choices: You eat snacks and watch Netflix together.
She wants to play Truth or Dare.
She wants to play Hide and Seek.
She commands you to kiss her foot.
She decides to use you as a sex toy.
1112.content:
Sarah reaches her hand out, curling her fingers around you. She stands up and opens her fist. Her eyes stare at the fragile little guy, whose laying in her palm.

“I think I’ll take you home with me.” She says. “It’ll be like a sleep over. I’ve never done one of those with a guy friend.”

You can hear the playful tone in her voice. You’re in trouble. Sarah’s fingers close on you again. She brings her hand to her purse and drops you into it. You grunt, as you painfully crash onto her phone cover, before sliding down the back of it and getting your leg stuck between a make-up box and the edge of her wallet. Above, you can only see glimpses of your friend’s shoulder and the side of her face.

Sarah turns back to where she came from and walks home. Even though she has a hard time grasping what just happened, the young woman is sure this will be the most fun night she’ll ever have with you.

While she walks home, you are fending off all the stuff she keeps with her, finally getting your leg unstuck, when a giant package of ten paper tissues slides over you and buries you. Your face gets pinned against a cold bottle of women’s deodorant, which makes it so you can only look in one direction, right at the packaging of what seems to be a female condom, your face quickly warms up after this.

You can hear Sarah opening the door to her house, slipping off her boots, and stomping up the stairs to her room. She sets her purse on the bed and opens it wide. Without much care she pulls you out by your leg and drops you down on the bedsheet. You are a bit bruised up, but alive. You look around, her room hadn’t changed much since the last time you visited, except of course, bigger. It is a proper adult room with some signs of how it looked during her childhood. You snap out of your train of thought, when Sarah plops her gigantic butt down onto the bed, sending you up few inches, before you smack face first onto the bedsheet again. You accidentally smell how much of her scent she had sweat into the sheets. Pushing yourself up, you look over at your friend, seeing her slip off her socks and throw them next to the bed. He brings her feet up and places one of them on either side of you. The smell is awful, but you stay quiet. You don’t want to hint at another thing she can tease you with.

“So, now that we’re home, it’s time to have some fun.” Sarah says, biting her lip.
1112.title: Unceremoniously Taken

choices: She let's you out when she gets home.
She keeps you in her mouth for the rest of the day.
She sucks too hard, and you burst.
She accidentally swallows you.
She swallows you on purpose.
1113.content:
Sarah looks down at your diminutive body with a wide smirk. Even at full size you knew you were in trouble if you saw this face. All you can do is hope she understands how fragile you are.

“You know.” She says. “You’re so small, I bet I could easily fit your entire body in my mouth.”

You look up at her lips, and the small glimpses of her tongue and teeth hiding behind them. There is no way you’d ever want to cross that threshold at your size. You tell her to stop teasing you, but that just causes her mouth to open in an even wider smile. She moves her hand towards you, and before you can even react, she pins you between her fingers and stands up. The giantess brings you up to her face and holds you in front of the massive blue eyes. All you can do is panic and hold on to the thick layer of skin squeezing you. With an adorable smile, your friend continues to tease you.

“I think you’ll make for a nice piece of candy to play with.” She says

You try to fight back, kicking and screaming as Sarah tilts her head back and opens her mouth. There is a sudden rush of shock, as you feel yourself falling, looking up at the fingers that let you go. Your wide view of the sky gets smaller, as the edges get blocked out by Sarah’s lips and you see the back of her teeth. You realize you’ve just passed into the mouth of a lifelong friend. Her lips are closing on the outside world, sealing you into a wet prison, which stinks of morning breath.

“Sarah, this isn’t funny let me out!” You scream, your voice echoing slightly because of her mouth’s acoustics.

The brunette starts to walk home, with a satisfied smile on her face. She can’t believe she is really doing this to a close friend like you. But getting her hands on something as impossible as a tiny person, makes it far too exciting to not to try some things.

By the time she is halfway home, your friend has already softly chewed you, and nearly drowned you in her saliva. Her favorite thing to do, is to use her tongue to pin you to the roof of her mouth, and gently suck on you like candy.

You don’t know how much more of this you can take, being played around with so carelessly and in such a personal and bodily manner. You know Sarah, she wouldn’t intentionally torture you, would she?
1113.title: Beyond Sarah's Lips

choices: Apologize, and beg her not to force you.
Apologize a little too hard, and tell her you like it in her mouth.
Try to escape.
Do the unthinkable, accept the chore.
11131.content:
Sarah gets home and walks to her room, with a mischievous smile on her face. She leans over her bed and looks down. As gravity shifts, you stumble across her slippery tongue onto the back of her front teeth. They are your floor for only a few seconds, until you friend opens her mouth. You scream and try to grab on to the slippery white rocks to no avail. You fall down into her soft bedsheets, while hearing Sarah laugh above you. In order to even see where you are, you have to dig your way through the cotton folds of the girl’s unmade bed. Your roll on to open mattress and try to shake some of you friend’s saliva off you.

“Ugh... Gross...” You say.

Sarah smiles down. “Nah, you tasted alright.”

“I was talking about the disgust mouth you nearly killed me in.”

Sarah goes quiet. You look up frowning, as she turns around and walks out of the room. You shrug and start to dry yourself off on Sarah’s bed, trading the saliva for the body smell the sheets are covered in. After less than thirty seconds the giantess stomps back into the room and slams something down on her nightstand. Confused, you look over to see what it is.

“Toothpaste?” You say.

Sarah crosses her arms. “Well, I’m very proud of my white chompers. And as far as I know, my mouth is so perfect and clean, it was a privilege for you to be in it.”

“Yeah, no. Your breath smells like ass.”

“Well, if you say so, I guess you’d know best.” Sarah says, smiling rather than looking defeated.

“Wait, why?”

Sarah’s eyes turn to the toothpaste and then back at you.

You feel a sudden pit in your stomach. “Oh, no…”

You friend looks at you with the widest smile. “Looks like you’ve talked yourself into doing a little chore for me.”
11131.title: Running Your Mouth About Her's

choices: Sarah is completely into her phone, you make it.
Sarah is done with her phone, you might be in trouble.
The ground quakes as Sarah shifts her foot a bit.
113.content:
You had to get off the ground, at your size an ant would overshadow you so survival on your own outside was out of the question. Sarah was your best and really only option for survival, the problem being that sole of her off brand Uggs towered high above you. You knew that they were less then an inch tall in reality, but from your new point of view they had to be well over 100 feet tall. The rest of Sarah was so massive that to her you must be little more then a speck by her feet one she'd soon be leaving behind once she noticed that you seemly ditched her.

You had to start moving, you didn't have time to think of the hows and whys of your situation. However, that was easier said then done as the tiny bits of gravel that made up the path leading into the park were now massive boulders each ranging from as small as 20 feet long and some of the larger ones passing 60 feet. You had found yourself standing on top of one of the great stones and would have to make your way to the base of Sarah's left foot.

It seemed you had at least the smallest bit of luck as the gaps between the gravel were never to large or at some point the stones overlapped with each other giving you passage. However, you knew with each minute that passed was a chance Sarah would look up from her phone to see you not there. You pushed yourself as hard as possible the sight of Sarah's boot dominating more and more of your view. Soon you could see little else then the massive wall of rubber that made up the sole of her boot.

While you had never taken a close look at soles of Sarah's boots, you had to imagine they looked far smoother from your former perspective. At your current size you could see all the imperfects, cuts, and dings in the material. Sarah might not enjoy the fact her expensive shoes looked so beat up even to someone as small as you, but all you saw were hand holds. You only hope you have enough time to climb up.
113.title: You try to climb her boot.

choices: You find a few loose threads to tie yourself down.
It seems Sarah is waiting around giving you a bit more time.
No time! Sarah is already taking her first step!
1131.content:
You couldn't be sure what could possibly be so interesting too Sarah, you'd say a boy, but you knew she was far to wrapped up in her studies or going to parities when she had free time. Even knowing Sarah for her whole life basically, that girl could still be a mystery at times. Whatever she was looking at, you just hoped she kept looking at it, it was keeping her mostly still.

You closed the gap soon standing at the base of the Ugg. You'd mostly lost sight of Sarah at this point, when looking up all you could really see was different shades of brown material making up the skyscraper sized boot you'd soon have to start climbing. You sighed, thinking about the color, she just had to pick brown, a color she'd have basically no change of seeing you on. It was a daunting task just making it up the sole of her boot, but you knew more then likely you'd have to climb up her boot and beyond to get her attention.

As you start your climb you find yourself with nearly endless places to grab onto. The rubber wall making a rather easy climb as you make your way up at a rather steady pace. It was nice that at least something even if it was climbing up your friends shoe was going well today.

You had made good time climbing up the sole of Sarah's shoe and even climbing up the side of her boot now standing on top of the toe. You looked up the surface of the brown boot the top was just above Sarah's ankle which was capped off with a forest of puffy white material you'd have to navigate. You glanced above it to the mile or so of blue denim making up just one of Sarah's jean covered legs. You swallow dryly looking back down to the top of her boot. "One thing at a time..."

While you wrapped your mind around the task in front of you Sarah had finally finished up with her phone dropping it back into her purse.

"Sorry about that, just a few friends wanting to throw an end of the semester party... Where did you go?

It was impossible not to hear Sarah's powerful voice ringing out from above. You weren't sure how much time you had before she got moving, but you needed to find a way to secure yourself before she did.
1131.title: Sarah is completely into her phone, you make it.

choices: Sarah takes a seat at a bench in the park.
Sarah head back to her apartment.
Sarah takes a seat at a restaurant for some breakfast.
11311.content:
You don't have much time, but it would seem luck was on your side. The top of her boot much like the sole had more then a few imperfections for you to take advantage of at your tiny size. You spotted what you could only guess was a bit of frayed thread in the distance. They would of been far to small for Sarah to notice, but too you each of the massive ropes of fabric was heavy and more then enough to hold your weight. You quickly pull at one of them and start to tie it around your waist.

"This isn't funny... fine, if you want to play hide and seek, you can play by yourself. I'll see you later." Sarah said in a bit of a huff having seemly been blown off by you.

You had just finished securing yourself when she started to walk, the force of her step pinning you down to her shoe and the impact of her boot hitting the ground shaking your bones. You gripped the bit of thread for dear life knowing if it wasn't for that thread you would of been tossed off. The heavy winds mixed with the crashing sounds from the impact of each step meant you couldn't hear much of anything as Sarah walked. You could only look on and hold on as she went about her day.
11311.title: You find a few loose threads to tie yourself down.

choices: You head out now climbing Sarah while she waits for breakfast.
You sit tight, it will be safer when she heads back to her place.
Someone joins her at the table?
113113.content:
The world is going by in a blur, Sarah's steps far to fast and far to chaotic for you too make out much of anything. All you could say is that she didn't seem to be in any kind of hurry as her walk seemed practically never ending. You finally felt her slowing her pace after what felt like an eternity on the worlds worst thrill ride. You hadn't had breakfast yet, but if you had, you were sure you would of lost it all over Sarah's boot.

Speaking of breakfast, you could smell the familiar sent of syrup,coffee,bacon, and eggs wafting through the air. You looked up from Sarah's boot watching her push up the glass door leading into a new world, that of a diner. A small local joint the two of you frequented often in fact, most likely where the two of you would of shared a meal if you hadn't of shrunk down.

"Sarah! How are you doing sweetie?" Kate greeted Sarah giving her a hug.

Kate had worked at the Big Bites Diner since you and Sarah were kids and she'd always acted like a second mother too the two of you even though she already had several kids of her own.

Kate was dressed in a simple black dress with slight low cut, the Diner's name printed on the right breast with her name right under it. She was in her mid forties now and looked great for her age having always kept on her feet as a single mother of twins. She always had a smile on her face which only grew wider when Sarah and yourself stopped by.

"Where is your other half?" Kate asked a bit confused seeing Sarah without you, one of you coming alone only meant one thing. "What are you two bickering about this time?

You listened in as Kate and Sarah talked a bit, Sarah saying there really wasn't anything. In fact she wasn't sure what was wrong since you just up and vanished on her. She came to the diner hoping you'd turn back up in fact. Kate gave Sarah a hug assuring her you'd show up sooner or later before sitting her down.

"Now let me get you something hot eat and drink to take you mind off all this. Kate smiled and Sarah thanked her before leaving the table.

You now could only see a mix of feet and legs the top of the table blocking your view of anything above.

You felt bad, Sarah seemed to be worried about you thinking that you must be mad about something. After all she couldn't of guessed you shrank to a speck and were riding on her boot. You needed to fix this, show her that you were still here, but on the other hand if you rush you might end up getting yourself killed by accident.
113113.title: Sarah takes a seat at a restaurant for some bre...

choices: You jump and make it!
You jump and FALL!
Something stops you?
1131131.content:
This was your best chance to get to Sarah, since she'd be sitting mostly still for at least an hour maybe more if she was in a thinking while sipping her coffee mood. You started to loosen your bindings pulling yourself free and making your way up Sarah's boot. You'd hardly made it up her foot and started the climb up towards her ankle when you heard the crash above.

You heard Kate's voice again, it seems like she just dropped off a fresh cup of coffee. The way Sarah responded it sounded like she was in a sipping mood probably feeling a bit put off by you vanishing on her. While she normally didn't like it when you bugged her when she was in this mood, in this case you'd hope she'd make an exception.

You climbed up her boots scaling the side until finally reaching the top rim just above her ankle. The thick puffy top gave you more then enough room to walk around with little fear of falling off. You crawled your way through it reaching the edge, Sarah's leg.

The blue jean covered leg lay before you, but there was a bit of an issue, the jeans were tucked into the boots leaving a good 10 foot gap between yourself and the denim wall. It was more then a little bit of a jump and if you messed it up well....

You looked down into the deep pit dropping down into Sarah's boot the light not even reaching half way down. However, you can't chicken out now as you have fully committed to this plan. You take a few steps back and then a few more before charging forward.
1131131.title: You head out now climbing Sarah while she waits...

choices: You get a grip and climb up like you planned.
You can't help yourself and go to slide into her pants.
You are knocked off her feet as Sarah starts to move in her seat!
11311311.content:
You crash into thick denim gripping onto the wall of blue with all your worth. Your heart is racing as you cling onto Sarah's jeans, you don't dare look down. You try not to think about what would happen if you slipped or simply fell off. Instead focusing on the climb ahead, which thankfully was no where near as long as if she'd been standing.

It was a solid 30 minutes of climbing before you finally reached Sarah's lap. Your arms were starting to burn, but you couldn't stop. They would get a small break crossing Sarah's thigh, but could see her shirt in the distance. While climbing took some time, the rather flat plan of her lap was easily enough to cross.

You made your way up Sarah's thigh reaching the edge of her jeans were her shirt lay in front of you. You could see a few massive gaps that if you had really wanted, you could slip under her shirt. This would be the worst possible thing for climbing, but it would put you in the perfect spot to get into her pants.

You blush a bit slapping yourself across, "Don't think like that." You mumbled to yourself. You guys were friends, you couldn't think of her like that... could you?

You find yourself looking over to the edge of her thigh as it dips down leading to gap between her upper thigh. A large zipper resting just above sealing off her unmentionables.

Your questionable thoughts are interrupted as Kate returns to the table.

"Are you ready for some food now sweetie or do you want another cup of coffee first?" "I could use another cup, but I'm ready for something to eat."

You were running out of time, whatever you were going to do, you needed to do it fast.
11311311.title: You jump and make it!

choices: Head for the silverware.
Make your way to the napkin.
Head out onto open table.
113113111.content:
You get a move on the fabric of Sarah's shirt giving you more then enough places to grab onto as you quickly start to pull yourself up. The climb, while long isn't all that exciting. You find yourself in the dim lighting under the table slowly climbing higher and higher. Your arms are burning as you slowly make it up Sarah's body inch by seemly unending inch. You are simply thankful that Sarah isn't in any rush and that Kate is taking her time serving her, you needed every second. You finally spot the exit the light at the end of the tunnel the gap between Sarah and the table.

As you pull yourself up and into the light you are finally able to see beyond the legs and feet of the diners. You are able to look out over the diner seeing that it is rather busy today with people filling up most of the tables and benches. However, your focus right now was on one person, that of Sarah. However, as you look up you aren't able to see her, well at least not her face. Her chest utterly dominates your view above jutting out like a great mountain.

You hardly have to think about it as you cling to Sarah's clothing in the shadow of her tits, you weren't going to be able to climb up and over them. Your arms were just about shot and even if they weren't you'd have to free hang as you climb the bottoms of her boobs. You'd most likely just end up falling to your death, no you'd need to find another way.

You are close enough to push off from Sarah's shirt and land on the cool plastic surface of her table. The massive surface stretching off into the distance in every direction. The only thing you could spot was a wall of white, which you knew was the skyscraper sized cup of coffee Sarah had been sipping at. The smooth surface had to be burning hot so that was a no go, but how else to get her attention?

"Sorry for the wait sweetheart. Here are some pancakes, scrambled eggs, and some extra bacon for the wait. You eat up, ok?" "Thanks Kate."

You hadn't even noticed Kate before she was standing right over you next to the table. You had a hard enough time getting use to the size of people, but it was the size and speed that you just couldn't get used to. It just didn't seem like something so massive should ever be able to move so quick! You might of hated, but that didn't stop that massive woman from skillfully lowering down a town sized plate. The titanic saucer filling your sky before crashing down leaving you in the shadow of the lip. She placed down some silverware to one side and a napkin on the other.

This was it, you had a few choices though none of them were perfect. The silverware was large and would be hard to scale, but if you could she would be handling them the most. This would get you close to her, but would also mean getting close to her fingers and mouth. The napkin was far easier to climb, but she might not use it or you could end up crushed against her face as she cleans up. You could just try to run out onto the table, hope that you aren't to small to still go unnoticed, though she might think your a bug or a crumb.
113113111.title: You get a grip and climb up like you planned.

choices: You are able to grab on.
You fall off and into the plate of food below.
Sarah spots something on her fork.
1131131111.content:
You figure the best place to get her attention would be her fork. It might be a bit dangerous, but she would be moving it close to her face and you'd have more then one chance at getting her attention. Also if you did fail you wouldn't end up crushed up inside of a napkin to be thrown out and could try to gets Kate's attention if worst came to worst. So you quickly got a move on, Sarah was thankfully more interested in finishing off her coffee giving you time to cross the gap between you and the edge of her fork.

The handle was mostly smooth, but a few imperfects and tiny nicks in the metal from years of use allowed you to scale the side of it. Once on top you quickly made your way down the long handle knowing that she'd never notice you before crushing you in her grip. It wasn't the safest place, but you'd need to be down on the prongs and get her attention while she was lifting up a bite of breakfast. You only hope she paid a little bit of extra attention to what she was eating today.

You'd hardly made it down when her hand crashed down onto the fork and it started to move. You watched the ground fall away as Sarah lifted her fork bringing it over her meal and readied it to snatch her first bite. This is when you realized you hadn't thought this all the way through as the fork started to turn in order to pint down to spear her first bite. You try to adjust to your floor turning into a wall, you small body sliding down one of the prongs of the fork. You reach out trying to grip the smooth metal....
1131131111.title: Head for the silverware.

choices: Sarah looks confused having seen something on her napkin.
Sarah doesn't notice a thing, her hand reaching down.
Sarah looks disgusted seeing a tiny bug on her napkin.
1131131112.content:
You start making your way over to Sarah's napkin it was the safest and smartest choice in your mind. The white surface area would make it far more likely that you'd be seen. It also wouldn't be used to later during the end of Sarah's breakfast, as long as she didn't make any kind of mess before hand. You knew this was a 50/50 bet since it seemed Sarah almost religiously dropped or spilled something on herself whenever they went out to eat. You hoped for the best as you heard Sarah starting her meal above.

The crashing down of massive metal structures being used to tear and rip up mountains of food. You could only hear what was going on above until you finally cleared the edge of Sarah's plate. You were finally able to look up and see your god like friend lifting up a bit of egg larger then a house on the tip of her fork. The eggy mass vanishing between her lips, the small bite not even worth chewing for her as she simply swallowed. The small lump hardly visible as slip down her throat. The scary part to you was that at your size, you'd be little more then a fleck of spice on that forgettable bite of egg.

After your reminder of how insignificant you are even compared to a girl's breakfast you hurried along to the napkin.

Your average napkin looked rather flat when looking down on it on your table. However, you found that not to be the case in reality as you walked up on a tower make up of layers of stacked sheets. This was far more manageable then anything you'd face so far however only being a short 20 or so feet too the top. Your arms had hardly had time to rest, but they would be able to handle it.

The rough surface of the napkin feels strange on your skin. It was hard to get used to as the once soft surface of even a napkin was now thick and heavy, so much so in fact your body weight had no effect on it. Just one more reminder about your state of being to add to the pile.

You make it too the top having to roll yourself over the edge and onto the surface of the napkin. "No...more...climbing...." Your arms were shot, you needed a break at least for a few hours before trying to climb anything at this point. If you planned work, you'd thankfully be done with climbing and finally get some help. You made your way across the white surface that spread out over a thousand feet across the massive square plateau. You were smaller then a fleck of pepper and could possibly end up crushed under a single grain of salt, but you hoped you stood out enough against the white world landscape for her to notice.

After a bit of walking you figured you were close to the middle of Sarah's napkin and it was time to face her. You turned to your childhood friend looking up as she was finishing up her breakfast. Her gaze slowly moving over to her napkin and looking down on you.
1131131112.title: Make your way to the napkin.

choices: A magnifying glass.
A finger tip.
The bottom of Sarah's coffee mug.
11311311121.content:
Deep pools of blue stare down at you as Sarah's brow crinkles a bit in a mix of confusion and curiosity. A hand coming up to brush a bit of her hair from her face behind her ear as she starts to lean in trying to get a much closer look. Her face seemly falling from the heavens and soon you went from looking up to Sarah to looking up to Sarah's left eye as it loomed above you. The great lake of blue started to study you closely seemingly straining to tell what exactly you were. You could only guess she had decided you weren't simply some bug or you'd of been long since crushed or wiped away.

It seemed like this moment lasted for hours, but in reality it had only been a few seconds. Her gaze growing frustrated seemly unable to make out what the god like girl was looking at. You started to worry that she might simply grow bored or frustrated and move on from her little find. Your fears seem to be confirmed as as pulls away massive winds rushing by you from the sudden giant movement.

"NO SARAH WAIT!" You scream out to her as she sits back up seemly done with you as she digs through her purse.

You start to panic, your heart was pounding. You had to get off the napkin, she was surely going to crush you any second! You looked off into the distance spotting the edge of the napkin, but it was so far away! You decided it was either fight or flight and you couldn't fight a girl miles tall so it was flight.

However, before you could even start running a new shadow fell over you bringing your attention to something hovering above you.
11311311121.title: Sarah looks confused having seen something on h...

choices: Sarah licks a finger tip then reaches down for you.
Sarah picks up the napkin and slips it into her pocket.
Sarah picks up the napkin and slips it into her purse.
113113111211.content:
Her eye was back once more though now distorted through the lens of her magnifying glass. She usually kept it on her to help read some of her more dense material for her classes, something you'd usually pick on her for. However, it would seem that nerdy tool was now your life saver. You made a promise to yourself to get Sarah the nicest magnifying glass money could by if you got back to normal size. You wave up a wave of relief on her face before having to fall to your knees your eardrums feeling as if they would burst as Sarah lout out an explosive gasp of sock.

"O, my god... Is that, is that you? How did you get here??? How did you get so small?

Sarah said in a mix of confusion seeing her friend impossibly small lost on her napkin. What she saw instead of you looking up like before you had fallen to your knees seemingly in pain. It took her a moment to realize her voice must be so loud it hurt your tiny ears.

"Sorry about that, I'll try to speak extra soft ok?"

Your ears were still ringing as Sarah's voice now dropped from an ear shattering roar to an overwhelming boom. You waved up to her trying to show her that you were doing better, her eye seemingly lighting up at your response.

"I don't know what happened to you, but I'm happy I found you. I mean I could of crushed you and not even noticed. You are going to have to come with me ok? We'll get you back to my place and figure out what to do with you. Now don't move to much its hard to keep track of you when your standing still.

You were simply happy to be noticed, though you weren't sure what Sarah could do and had hoped she'd take you to a hospital or a lab or something not her place. You couldn't really complain however watching her face pull away once more, Sarah dropping her magnifying glass back into her purse before leaning forward.

You look up having a hard time seeing past Sarah's chest her face peeking just past it a smile on her face. A shadow soon over taking you.

"Now come to Momma."
113113111211.title: A magnifying glass.

choices: You still firmly stuck in place.
You had fallen off on Kate during her hug.
You had come loose, but seemed to be hanging on for dear life.
1131131112111.content:
You weren't sure how exactly Sarah planned on getting you up off the napkin in one piece, but the rather mischievous look on her face made you a bit nervous. You had see that face far to many times growing up just before she did something she knew you weren't going to like. That's when you saw what her plan was, Sarah parted her lips and lightly licked the tip of her finger wetting it slightly before starting to bring it back towards you. "O no way, that is so gross Sarah you can't do that to, we have to find another way!" You stumble back trying to move away from her ever growing finger tip.

"Now, now don't be scared, its just a bit of spit and weren't you the one that always like giving me wet willies growing up? Just think of this as a bit of payback. Now stop moving, I don't want to smear you across this napkin."

This was just perfect, seems even at your dramatically reduced scale Sarah wasn't going to go easy on you. In any case you still weren't a fan of her plan keeping your stride across the napkin. "This is the worst idea you've..." You were cut short as her finger easily over took you, in reality Sarah had hardly notice you moved at all her finger easily coming down ontop of you with no real effort on her part.

"Gottcha."

Sarah's voice boomed as you felt the ground rush away as you found yourself stuck to the tip of her finger facing outward. The world zoomed by as she brought you up to her face. You could tell she was very pleased with herself and her tiny catch, even more so since you seemed to be alive and in one piece.

"Now lets get you home little guy." "Who are you talking too Sarah?"

A new voice entered, Sarah looking up to see Kate standing not to her. Sarah blushed a bit as if she had been caught in the act of something criminal or indecent.

"O, just talking to myself a bit. Just excited to be done with school is all. Though I should really get back to my place, I have a few friends expecting me and I shouldn't keep them waiting. How much for breakfast?" "Baby for you? Its on the house, think of it as a little graduation present. You head out and enjoy your day." "Thanks so much Kate."

Sarah stood up from the booth and tossed her arms around Kate giving her a hug before turning about grabbing her things and heading out. When looked down to her hand bringing up the finger you were stuck to bringing it up to her eye to see....
1131131112111.title: Sarah licks a finger tip then reaches down for ...

choices: Sarah arrives at her apartment, she lives alone.
Sarah arrives at her apartment, but is careful to avoid her roommate.
Sarah arrives at her best friends place, seems there was a change in plans.
11311311121113.content:
"O crap, o crap, o crap, hang on there little guy."

You had hardly been able to hang on as Sarah flung her arms around Kate only to then go about her morning as usual. Her saliva having dried up and lost its grip about halfway through. You were lucky you hadn't been sent flying off into the diner either falling to the floor to your death or falling into some person's breakfast. You'd give a piece of your mind too Sarah that was for sure, if you guys could figure out some way to speak to each other of course.

"I think I'll just keep you in my hand for now, alot less likely to get lost down there. Now hold on tight."

Sarah had lowered her finger down into her free hand letting you let go and drop down into it. Her skin was incredibly soft and the sent of coco filled the air from her moisturizer. You doubted your own hands would be so pleasant to someone your size, but Sarah was always great about taking care of herself and honestly you half the time. She'd always been the more responsible one out of the two of you.

It really wasn't far growing up she was responsible, smart, popular, and damn near ever guy hit on her from grade school to grad school. You were painfully average never really standing out from the crowd and now it only felt like that same dynamic was amplified a million times over. Now perfect Sarah was the size of some powerful goddess and you were so small you could literally get lost if someone wasn't paying attention for a moment. You were getting rather down on yourself a cold breeze rushed between the towers of Sarah's fingers rolling over the plain of her palm sending a shiver down your spine. You wished you could find a way to warm up at least her hand gave off some heat.

Sarah must of felt the slight breeze as well her hand starting to move though she never looked down. You watched her body growing closer and closer her white shirt as if to protect you from the wind. It took you a moment to notice where she now held you glancing up you followed the curve of her bra holding up her massive breast just in front of you. You can't help, but blush a bit being so close to Sarah's chest like this. She surely didn't notice were she was holding you right? You turned away feeling a bit self-conscious. You shouldn't be staring at her boobs, it was your friend Sarah .She wasn't that kind a girl, one you'd look at in that way, hell she said before she saw you like a brother.

Frustrated with yourself you decide to lay face down on the skin of her palm as she carried you trying to ignore the small mountain hanging just behind you.
11311311121113.title: You had come loose, but seemed to be hanging on...

choices: Jump Once: Into the ear.
Jump Twice: Time to meet Ally.
Jump Thrice: You find your phone in your pocket, but the batteries dead.
113113111211131.content:
You try to ignore the throughs running through your head, but it was hard to. At the moment Sarah literally surrounded you every breath you took was filled with the sent of her morning skin care routine after all. You pounded on her skin feeling a bit frustrated when you felt the world stop moving.

"Ok, home sweet home. Lets head over to the living room and see if we can finally figure some things out, like how I can talk to you at this size."

You sat up looking out from Sarah's hand between her fingers to her modest apartment. You'd been here a few times, even crashed no her couch once or twice. It wasn't much to write home about a small living area, a small kitchen off to the side with a small bar splitting the two room acting as additional counter pace and dinner table of sorts, her bedroom was down the hall a bit, across from her room her washer and dryer, next to those her bathroom, then at the end of the hall an extra bed, but she never let you use it when you came over. She always said it was for guests not for you, you think she just liked making you sleep on the couch for kicks.

You saw that very same couch you'd spent more then a couple nights on as Sarah walked up to it, kicking off her boots and sitting down. She leaned back raising her hand and by extension you up past her chest and up to eye level. Her eyes looked over you and you waved to her.

"Awww, that is so cute, was that you.. waving? God, you are so adorable..."

You watch her eyes freeze in place her face going red at the words, she found herself stumbling over them the moment she said them.

"At this size, I mean, so adorable at this size. Yeah, anyway. I hope you're ok, it at least looks like you are in high spirits sending out your little greetings. However, you are bit shrimpy to be sending out hand signals so we are going to have to figure something out. I mean I'm starting to feel like I'm going crazy talking to myself here.

Now here me out, I had a few ideas during the walk over here. I'm game for whatever you feel up for, but hear me out. I could, well I could put you in my ear. Its clean I promise. Maybe if you went in deep enough I might be able to make out your voice? I'm just worried you might get lost or stuck in there and a finger or a Q-tip digging around for you doesn't sound safe.

If that is a no I do have a friend, Ally, she is a wiz with electronics. I'm willing to bet she could even put a little something for you together to act as a radio or something. It might be a bit clunky, but I'm sure it would work. Though honestly I have no idea how she will react to you being this size and honestly I was kind a hoping to keep this quiet. The more people that know the more danger you'd probably end up in.

The last one is well unlikely, I mean if this was an option you surely would of done it by now. You couldn't of been so dumb as not to check for your cell phone did you? I mean if you had your phone you could of just called me. So what do you think? Ummm o yeah no talking, how about one jump for the first one, two for the second, and three for I'm dumb Sarah I have a phone on me?"
113113111211131.title: Sarah arrives at her apartment, she lives alone.

choices: It worked it turned on!
It didn't work, its still off.
It worked to well, the phone starts to smoke.
1131131112111313.content:
There was no way in hell you had your phone on you, after all if you did that would mean you risked your life for nothing. You didn't like your other two options, but you really didn't' have much of a choice... That's when you felt the small bulge of your smart phone in your jeans pocket. "Son of a bitch, Sarah is going to never let me live this down." You look up to her, her gaze waiting patiently for your response. A part of you just wanted to lie and only jump once or twice and pretend you hadn't found your phone and another thought about simply jumping off the side of her hand. Your better judgement overrode your shame as you jump up and down three times.

"HAHAHAHA! O MY GOD! Seriously!?

Her voice knocked you to your ass as she laughed at your boneheaded mistake that nearly got you killed a dozen different times this morning. "Yeah, yeah laugh it up." You sighed getting back up to your feet.

"I swear sometimes, you would never survive without me. If it isn't you forgetting your lunch at home, or your keys in your car, or about an exam you have to study for, its something new. But, enough of this one sided berating I'd like to hear your little moans and sighs, they always make things so much sweeter."

She was enjoying this moment far, FAR to much, but it was time to finally make contact with her. You pulled out your phone and... nothing. The screen lay black not turning on, you had charged it before you'd left that morning. Whatever shrank you must of drained the batteries or something. It seems like it wouldn't of been any help after all, a dead phone is no better then a paperweight and at your size there was no way to even plug it in.

You could see Sarah was getting a bit impatient, you waved out to her hoping she'd figure out what was going on.

"Come on down there, how long does it take to call me, I knew you have me in your contacts. I mean you have since we both got our first phones together. Wait, why are you, waving at me? Hold on, shit is the phone broken.. no you stopped moving, is it dead? Is the battery dead? I'll take your little waves as a yes then. Crap, we were so close, I guess we are back to my ear or Ally,...... unless.

Sarah shifts moving across the couch and bringing her hand closely along with her trying to keep an eye on you as she moves to the edge of the couch. She then slowly lowered her hand down onto end table, you weren't sure what she had in mind, but she obviously wanted you to get off her hand. You didn't fight it reaching the edge of one of her fingers you climbed down dropping down onto a light grey hard plastic surface. "Huh? What's this? This isn't that ugly brown end table. Where did you put me?" You looked up to Sarah smugly looking down on you.

"Lucky you I'm both a genius and lazy. I bought myself a wireless charging station for my phone last month so I didn't have to keep messing with cords. I know you have the same kind of phone as me and it might not be able to plug in, it should be able to use my charging station. I just hope it still works with your tiny phone."

You couldn't believe it, that might actually work! You look down to your phone pressing the power button.
1131131112111313.title: Jump Thrice: You find your phone in your pocket...

choices: She comes back in her sleep wear.
She comes back in her underwear.
She comes back in her birthday suit.
11311311121113131.content:
You held your breath clicking the button on the side of your phone, your heart was racing, then it lite it! The phone booting up slowly charging up from the charger you were currently standing on. "YES!" You had finally had some real luck here, it seemed you'd be able to finally talk to people and most importantly Sarah soon enough. You tried to wave up to her, her upper body leaned over the arm of the couch looming over you. You however, it seemed from so far up and on the light gray surface you didn't stand out enough for her to notice you movement. She looked a bit worried, after all if this didn't work it was likely she might never hear you.

You looked back down at your phone as it finally came to the home screen, you quickly went into your contacts and called Sarah.

*BUZZZZ* *BUZZZZ* *BUZZZ*

Even on vibrate you could hear the deafening rumbling of her phone bouncing around in her purse. You'd see Sarah's face light up then vanish as she moved out of view to grab her phone. She quickly returned though leaning in close as she raised her phone to her ear.

"I guess I can't say at least I'm taller anymore." Your joke obviously making it up to Sarah's ear. You could see it in her face, as if a massive weight had been lifted on her shoulders. She let out a long relaxing sigh,

"Yeah, guess that's one more thing I am beating you at.

Sarah got quiet for a moment seemly thinking about the situation and what she wanted to say.

"But seriously, I am kinda crazy worried about you. I mean look at you, a fly could probably crush you. We need to figure out what happened and get you back to normal.

You knew she was right, at that is size you had to worry about everything. The once safe world you lived in at 6 feet tall was long gone now that you were less then 1mm tall. It wasn't just miles tall people either, animals were titanic even a small mouse would be something out of a giant monster movie. Then came the bugs, at this size an ant would tower over you, in fact he might find yourself out sized by a flea. The only thing that made you feel even a tiny bit better was looking up to see Sarah watching over you.

"Honestly, I have no idea. I was standing at the entrance to the park with you everything was fine. Then something came over me, some strange feeling then an instant later I was looking up at you from ground level."

"Well, people just don't shrink down to specks out of nowhere. This has to be something man made, maybe some kind of weapon or device someone was testing. I mean it makes the most sense. After all you didn't just shrink your clothes came with you. It would also most likely be someone from my school seeing as we have a lab for building all kinds of stuff. I guess I'll be hitting Ally up after all, she spends a ton of time in the labs on the college grounds, maybe she's heard something. Though I think I'll keep you my little secret, if that's ok?

Sarah was right on the money as usual, it seemed like you had been right on the mark going to Sarah for help. "That is fine with me, I think I can only handle one gigantic pretty girl playing around with me at a time." As you finished you could see Sarah blush a bit smiling down at you.

"O is that so little man? Maybe we can see if you can really handle this girl or if I'm to much woman for the cute little speck I found during breakfast. I mean we have to pass the time somehow after all, Ally won't be free until tomorrow. So you wait right here little guy, I'm going to get comfy and then we will see what you can handle."

Sarah was a big tease normally, but now she was teasing on a new level seemly enjoying calling you small when ever she could. She loved to rub things in a bit and it seemed that your new size hadn't changed all that much. She worried about you, but found it far more fun to pick on you.

You watched Sarah end the call waving down to you before standing up and walking off. You lost track of her, but you could guess it was to the bedroom.
11311311121113131.title: It worked it turned on!

choices: Yeah, it kinda does.
No, not at all.
Hell, I was ogling you just as much as anyone else.
113113111211131311.content:
You had to admit you were rather jealous of Sarah right now, she could go change into something nice and comfy while you were going to be stuck in the same pair of jeans and the same t-shirt for sometime. They didn't exactly make clothing for someone your size after all. In fact, you weren't sure if it was even possible to make something small enough for you to really wear. The things that were going to make your life more then a little tricky were stacking up if you didn't figure this out and get back to normal.

A few small tremors announced Sarah's return moments before she turned the corner coming back into the living room. She was wearing a rather simple pair of rather short shorts and loose fitting tank top. She couldn't of gotten more casual if she tried as she walked over to the couch letting her massive body fall down into. You fall to your knees from the quakes sent off from the impact, "Jesus Sarah, maybe lose a few pounds before dropping down like a comet like that..." He said mostly because you knew she wouldn't be able to hear it.

Sarah glanced over to the charging station smiling as she pulled her phone from her shorts. A moment later your phone was ringing.

"Well, don't you look comfy?"

"I know, god, I haven't been able to just relax since we went out to that bar after midterms, you know when you got fucking plastered."

"Yeah, I was the one that got plastered. I seem to remember a little bit of that night and I remember you flashing half the bar and then I had to carry you to our Uber."

Sarah snickered a bit at the memory leaning over the arm of the couch and looking down on you.

"I did get a bit crazy that night, but I knew I'd be ok, after all you were there to watch out for my drunk ass. You always have been, ever since we were little. You always knew how to make me feel safe, even when I wasn't doing all that well."

"Well of course Sarah, I'd always watch out for you, I mean your my best friend. I wouldn't be a very good friend if I didn't watch out for you."

You could see Sarah blushing a bit, something was on her mind.

"Now, don't be an ass when I ask you this, but that night, at the bar when I was flashing random guys. I know I can be a bit of a free spirit around boys, but.... Does it every bother you? I mean, all those other guys ogling me?"

You weren't sure what to say at first, this was the first time Sarah had asked you anything like this before. You weren't sure if this was some kind of trick, if she was just messing with you, or what. You think it over before answering.
113113111211131311.title: She comes back in her sleep wear.

choices: Its only the first date! Relax with a movie.
Time to see more, explore Sarah.
Its been long enough, head to the bedroom and have some real fun.
1131131112111313111.content:
You admitted to Sarah, that it really had bothered more then you'd let on before. You were suppose to be friends, not her boyfriend after all so you hadn't felt like it had really been your place. It felt strange to voice any kind of attraction to Sarah, you'd been friends for longer then you even liked girls, back when most girls were covered in cooties. You never even filed Sarah in that camp, she was your friend and you had always thought it was better to keep it that way even as you noticed her starting to develop. You were worried you'd end up moving on her and messing up a life longer friendship. Now though? Now you were facing possibly dying at any moment with Sarah so large she seemed more like a mountain then a person. If this wasn't the time to get it off your chest, then when was?

Sarah bit her lower lip not saying anything for a moment or two. You didn't want to speak first simply looking up at her smiling seemly studying you then her lip was let free. A finger swung around and came down making land fall close by, the towering digit seemly waiting for you.

"Come on, climb on."

You didn't question it, making your way over to her finger and climbing up the thick ridges of her finger print. You'd hardly made it off the ground before the finger was airborne. High winds wiped by you as Sarah picked you up, where she was taking you, you had no idea. Her massive body was moving around and being so close it was impossible to really tell what the heck was going on. When it finally settled down her finger lowered back down, this time on a strange white surface. It didn't take a genius to understand she wanted you to get off here and after climbing down you jumped off her finger. The digit rushing back off a moment after you'd made land fall.

You looked out into the distant seeing the rest of the living room and Sarah's... legs? "What, where am I?" The ground under your feet started to quake softly as you heard Sarah start to giggle a bit. You stumbled falling onto your ass as the ground wobbled and shook slowly it returned to normal. That's when it hit you as you started to turn around to see Sarah face rising over you a bit as she looked down at the tiny speck she'd placed on her tit, the tiny thing just big enough to stand out against the white fabric of her tank top.

"Well, what do you think? No one else around, but you, no one looking at me, but you, no one I'd rather be with, but you."

Sarah blushed, the sound of her heart starting to race started to reach your ears. Your own face had turned red as well as Sarah continued.

"I had kind of planned on bringing you back to my place from the start. Though you were suppose to be a little bit taller. We were suppose to walk through the park, get some lunch at Big Bites, go hang out by the lake when we were kids. Then I thought, I thought I'd invite you back here, for a little Netflix and chill."

You were caught off guard to say the least, you'd always assumed that Sarah saw you as a brother or at best just a friend. Here she was all the same confessing having feelings. "But, what about all those times you said I was like a brother to you? What about all those times you joked about how strange it would be to date since we were so close?"

"I.. I didn't want to make things weird. I'd seen friends break up with boys some saying they were just going to stay friend after. I never saw it work out, not once. So when I started.. well seeing you as more then a best friend I thought I needed to squish it. I thought I was saving our friendship and well you never made a move other then when we joked about it. So I thought well I thought you probably weren't interested anyway. I was only going to bring it up now, to give it a shot because, I wasn't sure if we would see each other again. I mean with college over who knows what jobs we might get or where we might live. I thought what was the harm if it doesn't work? We were most likely going to end up moving to different states or something anyway."

You realized in that moment, the problem, the two of you were the same. You both had been so worried about hurting the other and ruining your friendship that you didn't want to risk making it something more. You can't help, but laugh a bit, "I'm such an idiot, I mean really we both are. I feel exactly the same way Sarah. I just thought, well, I just thought you weren't interested in me and I didn't want to try to make things weird by coming on to you."

You could see Sarah tearing up a bit,

You fucking jerk, I should just smush you for being so stupid. What guy can't figure out a girl likes him when she wants to hang out with him all the time, hangs on him at bars, and teases him all the time. And why am I so dumb not to see that how sweet you've been to me, how you always check on me and know how to cheer me up, how you are always the first person to know I'm having a bad day and bring me my favorite brooding ice cream. We are so dumb and now, when we finally just say something, you are so small I could lose you in the pocket of my shorts. I mean christ I have belly button lint that would be big as a house compared to you.

You stand up walking closer to Sarah moving up along the curve of her breast. "Hey, we might be idiots, but at least we are together right? Our kind of dumb seems to work together rather well, so as long as we stick together I think we can work things out. It might not be ideal, but there is no other place I'd rather be right now... well I mean with you, being on your mini-mountain of a boob is just a bonus."

You can see Sarah's eyes start to dry and a small smile cross her lips as she rolls her eyes.

"God, your such an idiot, but at your my idiot. I just wish I could hit you for that last little remark mister, though I think you'd just end up a mess across said boob if I did. So I'll just have to save that for when we get you back to full size."

"Sounds like a deal, just try not to hit to hard when I do. I swear you can be crazy strong when you get angry."

Sarah smiles laughing lightly the two of you now closer then ever. It would seem you found yourself now the boyfriend? of your miles tall best friend? It certainly wouldn't of been what you expected out of your day when you got up this morning.

Though at your size it was easy to do more then hurt you by accident. You get to your feet looking off from her nail to her blue eyes looking you over.

113113111212.content:
Your blood ran cold seeing the tip of Sarah's finger growing larger and larger slowly moving along with your attempts to escape it. You could see Sarah's face looming high above a look of disgust having utterly over taken it. This is when you see what it was she fished out of her purse, a tissue. You knew what that finger was for without a doubt now, but you couldn't stop trying to get away. You kept running, kept moving hoping that something would stop her something would save you. The sky grew darker as the tip of her finger blotted out more and more of the world. You couldn't die like this!

She lifted her finger, seeing a tiny red dot on the tip. She hadn't been sure if she'd crushed it, she hadn't felt it pop when put her finger down, but the tiny remains were proof enough. 113113113.content:
You get ready to climb, but Sarah seemed to have different plans as the ground shook under your feet tossing you onto your backside as she shifted slightly. It seems she wasn't all that comfortable in the cheap setting at the diner. You and her had been complaining about it since you were in middle school and it still hadn't gotten any better. While this had at best been a minor irritation growing up, right now, at your size, a minor irritation wasn't so minor anymore. You attempted to get your feet under you, but Sarah wouldn't stop shifting seemly unable to find a place she liked.

You'd made it to your hands and knees when the sky went dark, you look up to see a while of blue denim clad thigh rising up into the sky. You yell out as it starts to come down ontop of you. "SARAH NO WAIT!"

Sarah crosses her legs wiggling about in her seat a bit, "God, these booths suck. I wish Kate could get that cheap ass owner to finally get ride of them."

She never finds what is left of you, her thighs grinding together smearing what was left of you into a fine paste no one would even be able to see on her jeans.
113113113.title: You are knocked off her feet as Sarah starts to...

1133.content:
You try to steady yourself as your mile tall friend started to shift her weight a bit. The simple action pushing around a few hundred thousand tons of gravel and tossing you to your ass. It had been scary before hearing it, but being so close now Sarah's casual power was terrifying. You would need to move quick if you were ever going to survive.

You started to get to your feet only to be knocked off them once more Sarah was adjusting her stance. You could see her massive hips shifting her weight high above. You struggled to hold on to the bit of gravel you were trapped on as Sarah fidgeted a bit.

"Hold still dammit!" You yelled up in frustration knowing she never hear a thing.

While Sarah hadn't heard it it seemed she was responding anyway as the front of her boot lifted up off the ground. You hit by a massive pressure wave from the giant object takes off rushing up several hundred feet into the air. You watch as the wall in front of you vanishes now hanging high above in the sky.

Your eyes go wide as it starts to move over and soon your sky is made up by the under side of Sarah's brown boot. The great shadow casting you in an woman made eclipse.

"NO SARAH DON'T!" You'd scream out in vain as you watch the sole of her boot quickly falling down towards you.

Sarah put down her foot having moved it and inch or so to the left. She'd never know what happened to you, the tiny stain you left on the sole of her boot to small to notice if she'd even of thought of looking in such a place for her friend.

So the young woman would go about her day unaware her absent minded movement had lead to the death of her friend.
1133.title: The ground quakes as Sarah shifts her foot a bit.

115.content:
Sarah puts her phone away and notices you’re gone. The giant brunette shifts her feet against the gravel, looking around in confusion. Your attractive young friend stands above you like a titan. The awe and fear of the sight sends shivers down your spine. You try and power through, knowing you have to get her attention.

“Sarah, I’m down here!” You scream at the top of your lungs.

The giantess turns around, not sure what she heard. She scans the ground until her bright blue eyes lock on to you. You smile, knowing you’ve safely grabbed her attention. That’s when Sarah’s expression changes. She squints and curls up her nose in disgust. A sudden terror washes over you, as you know what she’s thinking.

“Wait, no! Sarah!” You plead, but there is no escaping it.

Your friend raises her boot and shows you the bottom of it. You have only a second to take in the view, before the young woman takes a simple but deadly step forward. Your screaming is cut short as you flatten under the pressure of Sarah’s weight. To her disappointment, there is no satisfying crunch when she snuffs out the bug, just a little squirt of blood. Sarah takes quick peek at the bottom of her boot, before continuing to look for you. Your remains slowly fading into the rubber underside with each step.

The attractive young woman will have a bright future as a successful lawyer. She’ll often think back and wonder what happened to her missing childhood friend, never knowing she gave him the bug treatment.
115.title: Like a Bug Beneath a Friend's Boot

choices: Kate notices you before she sits.
Her butt misses you by an inch, and you climb her thigh.
Her butt misses you by an inch, and you scream for help.
Her butt misses you by an inch, and you try to escape the dinner.

12.content:
You'd just finished up the last of your college exams. You'd been up for what felt like that last week trying to cram what felt like all the knowledge of man kind into your head. Now you just wanted to take a load off and let your brain turn into a nice soft pile of mush, at least for the next couple of months before you started really applying for jobs using your shiny new degree.

Your first stop was of course Big Bites Diner. You knew Kate would be waiting to see you and offer up some hot food and maybe a fresh bit of cake or pie she'd wiped up in the back herself.

Kate had worked at the Big Bites Diner since you and you childhood friend Sarah were kids and she'd always acted like a second mother too you and Sarah. Kate was in her mid forties now and looked great for her age having always kept on her feet as a single mother of twins. She always had a smile on her face which only grew wider when Sarah and yourself stopped by.

It would be nice to see her since Sarah was still busy with her own exams, ever the overachiever she still had far more classes to finish up then you did. So you figured you'd grab lunch, see Kate, then meet up with Sarah for dinner to go over your post college plans.

You walked into the diner, a few other students from the college scattered about the small restaurant having lunch, but it was rather quiet. At least until you heard Kate spot you.

"Sweetheart!" You looked over to see Kate making her way over to you. Kate was dressed in a simple black dress with slight low cut, the Diner's name printed on the right breast with her name right under it. Her long black hair pulled back into a pony tail. A large smile on her face as she grabbed you and hugged you tight. "I guess you my big college grad now huh? I swear you and Sarah are finishing up school getting ready to move away and my own girls are just starting college next semester. I remember when all of you were so little, time just moves to fast."

You grin, "Yeah, time files by, just seems like yesterday you were sneaking me and Sarah an extra scoop of ice cream even though our parents said we had enough." The old memory was a happy one for yourself and Kate who couldn't help, but sigh, you could see her eyes a bit red as if ready to cry. "But, enough about the past, I spent all morning on exams and I'm feeling a bit burnt out." You said.

Kate nodded, "So your school day special then, no problem sweetie, you just go grab yourself a booth. I'll probably join you, I'd love to talk to you a bit before you head out. I mean it might be the last time I see you after all." You nod, you did feel a bit bad, Kate looked like she was losing a son and in a way she kinda was.

You take a seat at an empty booth waving over to Kate to show her where you were. Then you felt a bit strange, maybe you'd sat down a bit to fast? You couldn't be sure, but the lights seemed to be getting dim....

--------------------------------------------------------------

You jolted up, had you passed out? You were confused at where you were the ground under you stretched out around you in ever direction and something hug over you casting a bit of a shadow. "Where the hell am I?"

"Sweetie, here is your school day special... Sweetheart, where did he go?"

You looked up and up... and up to see Kate looming over you. You'd, shrunk!?! You were now a fraction of your size standing in the booth you'd been sitting in just moments before.

"I guess I'll just take a seat and wait for him to get back."

Your eyes go wide as Kate turns around and starts to sit down. You don't have time to think about what had happened or how as start to run trying to avoid being crushed under Kate's backside.
12.title: Kate

info.brief_description: Giant friends, right? Can't survive with them. Can't survive without them.
info.description:
The idea is simple.
You end up shrunken around a friend.

The question is…
Can you get their attention?
Can trust them at your fragile state?

(The story is written from a male perspective, because I found this was the most common demographic.)

Rules
1. No characters younger than 18.
2. Death, gore and scat are allowed, as long as readers are given the option to avoid it.
3. No invincibility and no vore survival. (Keep it realistically dangerous to be small)
4. Giant male content only allowed in a male friend's story.***
5. No chapters with less than 500 characters.
6. All chapter additions must be in English.
7. Do not link to photographs of real people.
8. Write in second person. (You)
9. No diapers.

***There is no male friend option yet, I will add one upon request.

Common Courtesy
Read your chapter for any spelling mistakes before posting,
and try to not make every option about one type of interaction.
Leave options for people with different tastes.
info.pretty_title: With Friends Like These, Who Needs Gods?
